TT - take AJ on - you know - a radio show, a web show, web sites,videos etc. and allow and encourage people to get the stuff for free.
You aren't really prejudiced just jealous and envious of the great AJ.
And, go to his office and protest and while you are there comment on his family.
Some Texas whupass - that is what you will go home with (I mean the penthouse-oops- i mean your momma's attic).

Timmy, thank you.

I appreciate the Michael Collins Piper reference you provided a while back. That was a Constructive Act on your part. You may be surprised to know that I listened to some of the material and found certain selections quite informative - for that I thank you. Additionally, however, there was material that did not have breadth of informed research or documentation (i.e., conflating certain public figures with various movements or ideologies without having the whole informed story). Though one could spend time taking issue, that would be a diversion of energy and effort. Needless to say, I appreciate being afforded the opportunity to expand my horizons and acquire additional data points.

I also want to thank you for affirming my humble encouragement to provide Alex Jones with business. You provided a fantastic amplifier - as with electicity, money or success is often rooted in a similar nature- IT IS INDUCTIVE.

That fact and concept aside, the old divide and conquer strategies - whether honest in origination or a matter of CoIntelPro - are failing with those that seek truth and fact in a more thorough and intellectually honesty manner.

There just isn't much room left for sophomoric emotional sand traps and division. Especially when so much of the world has exacted privilege forged upon genocidal policies against the American Indian, my heritage, my Mother's people and Mother Earth herself.

As easy as it is to point the finger at a select group of people (without recognizing the corruption of the human heart amongst all peoples) well, it is just as easy to blame dominant populations for having given up their sovereignty and freedoms without a fight or their inability to unite with the inclussion of diversity or through Everyone's own personal greed and sloth or any other cardinal sin conceivable in the hearts and minds of men.

Alas, there is a New Warrior emerging - one that is not so easily identified. One not so easily recognized. One not defined by the old paradigms. One that the old ways of division and destruction are no longer working.

Like tribal elder Liichaat has reflected - this age is like a leaf turning.

When all is said and done we will have all played our part and we will have all played our role because there is an overarching archetypal unity that reaches from a higher place, a higher reality, a higher existence.

Thank you for being a teacher.

.-.-.

Yeah Aladinpoo, you're right, I am jealous of Alex Jones' fat belly, flabby weak arms, fat ass, and all those hook nosers in his house. 

A wise man desireth not material possesions, which is the only thing Alex Jones has.

Am I jealous that Alex Jones has sold out his country to the International Jewish Swindle?
